These have 5.1 surround sound via Dolby Digital.  The only device that will automatically play that track is the Apple TV however.  Otherwise your device will default to the AAC track.  Your device may have options to let you choose the alternate track.  You may easily convert these to MKV format using mkvtoolnix.  It will take you approximately 2-3 minutes per film to change to MKV which may be more compatible with your playback device.  If you change to MKV then you most likely do not need the AAC track so uncheck that track when you do the container swap.
